title: A Country practice: the wedding
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television series - Australia
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television series
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Country life - Australia
description: Television soaps are famous for their elaborate funerals, births and weddings, and long-running Australian favourite "A Country Practice" was no different. This episode features the long awaited wedding of city doctor Simon Bowen to local vet Vicky Dean. Between last minute patient emergencies and an injured horse requiring urgent attention, locals wonder - will Simon and Vicky make it to the church on time?
